summary: A group of unsuspecting theatre goers are trapped, after a ravenous spirit is resurrected and released from a Ouija board.
cast: Justin Armstrong|Gerald Crum|Sally Greenland|Ty Larson|Swisyzinna|Shanon Snedden|Jessica Willis|Eric Window|Eric Zettina|Tom Zembrod|Israel Luna|Chaselyn Wade|Nicole Holt
title: The Ouija Experiment 2: Theatre of Death
